00050         bool read(const char *arquivo)
00051         {
00052                 FILE *pf; char *buffer, *p, sep[] = " <>\n";
00053                 int status = 0, i, vtemp = 0, ctemp = 0;        long lSize;     bool ler;
00054 
00055                 if (!(pf = fopen(arquivo,"rt")))
00056                 {
00057                         printf("Error reading file %s\n",arquivo);
00058                         return false;
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 fseek(pf , 0 , SEEK_END); lSize = ftell(pf); rewind(pf);
00062         
00063                 MF_ASSERT(lSize > 0);
00064 
00065                 buffer = new char[lSize];
00066                 MF_ASSERT(buffer);
00067 
00068                 fread(buffer,1,lSize,pf); fclose(pf);
00069 
00070                 // status
00071                 // 0 : sem comando
00072                 // 1 : TES_XML
00073                 // 2 : database
00074                 // 3 : tables
00075                 // 4 : vertices
00076                 // 5 : cells
00077 
00078                 p = strtok(buffer, sep);
00079                 while(p != NULL)
00080                 {
00081                         ler = true;
00082 
00083                         if(status == 0)
00084                         {
00085                                 if(strcmp(p,"MF_XML") == 0) status = 1;
00086                         }
00087                         else if(status == 1)
00088                         {
00089                                 if(strcmp(p,"database") == 0) status = 2;
00090                                 else if(strcmp(p,"/MF_XML") == 0) status = 0;
00091                         }
00092                         else if(status == 2)
00093                         {
00094                                 if(strcmp(p,"name") == 0) ler = attrib(db, strtok(NULL, sep));
00095                                 else if(strcmp(p,"host") == 0) ler = attrib(host, strtok(NULL, sep));
00096                                 else if(strcmp(p,"port") == 0) ler = attrib(port, strtok(NULL, sep));
00097                                 else if(strcmp(p,"user") == 0) ler = attrib(user, strtok(NULL, sep));
00098                                 else if(strcmp(p,"password") == 0) ler = attrib(pass, strtok(NULL, sep));
00099                                 else if(strcmp(p,"tables") == 0) status = 3;
00100                                 else if(strcmp(p,"/database") == 0) status = 1;
00101                         }
00102                         else if(status == 3)
00103                         {
00104                                 if(strcmp(p,"vertices") == 0) status = 4;
00105                                 else if(strcmp(p,"cells") == 0) status = 5;
00106                                 else if(strcmp(p,"/tables") == 0) status = 2;
00107                         }
00108                         else if(status == 4)
00109                         {
00110                                 if(strcmp(p,"name") == 0) ler = attrib(vtable, strtok(NULL, sep));
00111                                 else if(strcmp(p,"id") == 0) ler = attrib(vid, strtok(NULL, sep));
00112                                 else if(strcmp(p,"dimension") == 0)
00113                                 {
00114                                         ler = attribint(vdim, strtok(NULL, sep));
00115                                         if(vdim > 0)
00116                                         {
00117                                                 coords = (char**) new char*[vdim];
00118                                                 for(i = 0; i < vdim; i++)
00119                                                         coords[i] = NULL;
00120                                         }
00121                                 }
00122                                 else if(strcmp(p,"coord") == 0)
00123                                 {
00124                                         MF_ASSERT(vtemp < vdim);
00125                                         ler = attrib(coords[vtemp++], strtok(NULL, sep));
00126                                 }
00127                                 else if(strcmp(p,"/vertices") == 0)     status = 3;
00128                         }
00129                         else if(status == 5)
00130                         {
00131                                 if(strcmp(p,"name") == 0) ler = attrib(ctable, strtok(NULL, sep));
00132                                 else if(strcmp(p,"id") == 0) ler = attrib(cid, strtok(NULL, sep));
00133                                 else if(strcmp(p,"dimension") == 0)
00134                                 {
00135                                         ler = attribint(cdim, strtok(NULL, sep));
00136                                         if(cdim > 0)
00137                                         {
00138                                                 vertices = (char**) new char*[cdim];
00139                                                 for(i = 0; i < cdim; i++)
00140                                                         vertices[i] = NULL;
00141                                         }
00142                                 }
00143                                 else if(strcmp(p,"vertex") == 0)
00144                                 {
00145                                         MF_ASSERT(ctemp < cdim);
00146                                         ler = attrib(vertices[ctemp++], strtok(NULL, sep));
00147                                 }
00148                                 else if(strcmp(p,"/cells") == 0) status = 3;
00149                         }
00150 
00151                         if(ler) p = strtok (NULL, " <>\n");
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 delete [] buffer;
00155 
00156                 if((status == 0)&&
00157                         (host)&&(port)&&(db)&&(user)&&(pass)&&
00158                         (vtable)&&(vid)&&(vdim > 0)&&
00159                         (ctable)&&(cid)&&(cdim > 0))
00160                         return true;
00161                 else
00162                         return false;
00163 
00164         };

00176         char* getCellsIdField() {return cid;};

00178         char* getCellsField(int dim) {return vertices[dim];};

00182         bool attrib(char *&orig, char *src)
00183         {
00184                 int tam; char *temp;
00185 
00186                 if(*src != '/')
00187                 {
00188                         tam = strlen(src);
00189                         if(tam > 0)
00190                         {
00191                                 temp = new char[tam + 1];
00192                                 MF_ASSERT(temp);
00193                                 if(temp)
00194                                 {
00195                                         strcpy(temp, src);
00196                                         if(orig) delete [] orig;
00197                                         orig = temp;
00198                                         return true;
00199                                 }
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202                 return false;
00203         };
00204 
00205         bool attribint(int &orig, char *src)
00206         {
00207                 if(*src != '/')
00208                 {
00209                         orig = atoi(src);
00210                         return true;
00211                 }
00212                 return false;
00213         };
